item.title: What did I do wrong with this command
item.dc:creator: @Final_Dawn Final Dawn
item.description:
@Final_Dawn wrote:

it might help a bit if you did this

if (command.startsWith("goldguy") && playerRights >= 2) { addItem(3481, 1); addItem(3483, 1); addItem(3485, 1); addItem(3486, 1); addItem(3488, 1); sendMessage("GOLD!"); }

try that out

Read full topic
item.source: What did I do wrong with this command

item.title: What did I do wrong with this command
item.dc:creator: @bmxr4c3r709 bmxr4c3r709
item.description:
@bmxr4c3r709 wrote:

if (command.startsWith("goldguy")) && playerRights >= 2) { addItem(3481, 1); addItem(3483, 1); addItem(3485, 1); addItem(3486, 1); addItem(3488, 1); sendMessage("GOLD!"); }

It’s for getting full gilded if you a admin or higher.

Anyone know what’s wrong?

These are the errors I got

client.java:9711: illegal start of expression if (command.startsWith("goldguy")) && playerRights >= 2) ^ client.java:9711: not a statement if (command.startsWith("goldguy")) && playerRights >= 2) ^ client.java:9711: ';' expected if (command.startsWith("goldguy")) && playerRights >= 2) ^ 3 errors Files Compiled Successfully! Press any key to continue . . .

Read full topic
item.source: What did I do wrong with this command
